org.cyanogenmod.launcher.home.api.db

Class CmHomeDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • org.cyanogenmod.launcher.home.api.db.CmHomeDatabaseHelper

  • public class CmHomeDatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper

    Creates the SQLite database that backs CMHomeContentProvider.

    This class is intended to be internal, and does not need to be referenced by applications using the SDK.
